mapper.select: SELECT t.ticketCode, ticketName, TO_CHAR(sales_start, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') as sales_start, TO_CHAR(sales_end, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') as sales_end, s.address1, detail.price, t.storeCode FROM ticket t JOIN ( select ticketcode, min(price) as price from ticketDetail group by ticketcode ) detail on detail.ticketCode=t.ticketcode JOIN store s ON t.storeCode=s.storeCode WHERE t.ticketCode=#{ticketCode}
SELECT TO_CHAR(use_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as use_start FROM ticket where storeCode=#{storeCode}

SELECT ticketDetail.ticketDetailCode, TO_CHAR(use_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as use_start, ticketdetail.ticketDetailName, ticketdetail.price, ticketdetail.count FROM ticket LEFT OUTER JOIN ticketDetail ON ticket.ticketCode=ticketDetail.ticketCode WHERE storeCode=#{storeCode} AND use_start=#{date}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO storeReview (reviewCode, storeCode, star, content, userIdx) VALUES (storeReview_seq.NEXTVAL, #{storeCode}, #{star}, #{content, jdbcType=CLOB}, #{userIdx})
INSERT INTO wishlistcode_dt (wishCode, userIdx, productCode, amount, price) VALUES (wishCode_dt_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userIdx}, #{ticketDetailCode}, #{buyCount}, #{price})
